==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=功亏一篑}}

===Etymology===
Literally: to be one basket (of dirt) short of success (in one's attempt to build a nine [[仞|ren]] high mound)
: From the longer phrase (first part is usually omitted): [[為]][[山]][[九]][[仞]]，'''功虧一簣'''
